title: BRIEF-Velan Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share Of $0.06
text:
BRIEF-Velan Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share Of $0.06

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 10, 2019 18:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Velan Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share Of $0.06 Oct 10 (Reuters) - Velan Inc : * REPORTS ITS SECOND QUARTER 2019/20 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q2 SALES FELL 6.5 PERCENT TO $85.5 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 * NET NEW ORDERS OF US$90.7 MILLION FOR QUARTER * ORDER BACKLOG OF US$425.6 MILLION AT QUARTER END * QTRLY BOOKINGS AMOUNTED TO $90.7 MILLION, A DECREASE OF $12.8 MILLION OR 12.4% COMPARED TO LAST YEAR

BRIEF-Velan Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share Of $0.06
